Text: without a boot sector ? :p i'll doubt if it will work by just copying the files

I'm just writing to beg for seeding!

I just burned an iso, booted it, loaded the live system then written to the usb.
I tried the USB with these files on it and it's working perfectly. Just press ESC when booting your Eee, then choose USB as boot device.
